author: Staff Reporter
text:
Autopsy report on IPS officer N. Harish who was found dead at the Police Officers’ Mess in Egmore on Thursday is yet to be released. Meanwhile, the body was handed over to the family. A senior police official said the cause of death would be known only after the autopsy report is out.

Harish, a native of Bengaluru, was serving as Assistant Superintendent of Police in the Directorate of Vigilance and Anti-Corruption here.
title: Autopsy report on Harish’s death awaited
